title: Just wanted to share something.
body:
I'm fairly new to the game and was trying out ARAM. Fiora is one of the character's I purchased, and I wanted to know if this is sort of a big play that you'd guys appreciate.

http://youtu.be/PmzPAixzJ8I

replies.body:
Nice job! 

I literally said "OH MAN, THE PLAYS" when you dodged the Syndra ulti. xD
Big plays spotlight pls. xD

> Big plays spotlight pls. xD

I sent it in

> Big plays spotlight pls. xD

Agreed.  x1000

> Nice job! 
> 
> I literally said "OH MAN, THE PLAYS" when you dodged the Syndra ulti. xD

Welcome to the Riot team, too
Thanks so much! ^__^
Good job on the fiora plays

> Nice job! 
> 
> I literally said "OH MAN, THE PLAYS" when you dodged the Syndra ulti. xD

Thanks! I had some friends tell me to stack AD and AS. The Kayle on my team was really helpful with her ult.

Okay, is everyone calling the time when Fiora is fighting during a Kayle Ult on her the "Syndra ult dodge"? 

Just wondering, cuz she still gets hit by 3 balls, she's just invulnerable.
Not trying to downplay the guy or anything, everyone's just freaking about this ult dodge that wasn't actually dodged and I'm wondering if I"m missing something >.>
yeah, you know, I guess it's more of a block than a dodge. Though they're pretty much syonymous. Either way it was a great play when kayle put the ult up.

Haha, that's amazing. Are you new to Fiora? That Syndra ult dodge made me nerdgasm.
Please don't say you're new to Fiora, because I could never pull off something like that and I'm a Fiora main. xD

> Haha, that's amazing. Are you new to Fiora? That Syndra ult dodge made me nerdgasm.
> Please don't say you're new to Fiora, because I could never pull off something like that and I'm a Fiora main. xD

I'm pretty damn new, only level 15. I bought fiora two days ago.

Awesome! On the Rift do you play her Mid or Top?
Also, Guinsoo is in the middle of reworking Fiora, her ult won't make her untargetable any more :(

> Awesome! On the Rift do you play her Mid or Top?
> Also, Guinsoo is in the middle of reworking Fiora, her ult won't make her untargetable any more :(

I play her top, and I don't mind if they make her targetable with her ult. Just gives me another challenge to surpass.
Haha, on the other hand she has a disengage and her riposte will block spells. I main her mid, I'm only in Bronze but if you hit me up I can give you some Fiora mid tipperinos. :D
Thanks!

So good. I could never get the hang of Fiora, I find it impressive when people can do more than feed with her, let alone make a big play like that. ;p

{{champion:21}}
Woah, that was pretty cool.

> Woah, that was pretty cool.

Thanks!
I logged in just to gives this kudos...that was wicked! Keep playin Fiora!!

> I logged in just to gives this kudos...that was wicked! Keep playin Fiora!!

Thanks
